subject: Re: Reuters: Prison Guards Skipped Mandatory Checks Before Epstein Death >> EDGR 0OAG)" 08/11/2019 09:29 >>> Gentlemen. Do you have time for a quick update call before I leave for my trip with the AG? Does 12 noon work? If there is something new and pressing, we can do a call earlier. Tim On Aug 10, 2019, at 10:20 PM, Hugh Hurwitz PEGE bop gov> wrote: How do they have this info? Unbelieveable.
body:
Death
>> EDGR 0OAG)" 08/11/2019 09:29 >>>
Gentlemen. Do you have time for a quick update call before I leave for my trip with
the AG?
Does 12 noon work? If there is something new and pressing, we can do a call
earlier.
Tim
On Aug 10, 2019, at 10:20 PM, Hugh Hurwitz PEGE bop gov> wrote:
How do they have this info? Unbelieveable.
https://www.breitbart.com/politics/2019/08/10/report-prison-guards-
Hugh
